00059 
00060   void process_event(EventPtr &event_ptr) {
00061     int32_t error;
00062     const uint8_t *ptr = event_ptr->message + 4;
00063     size_t remaining = event_ptr->message_len - 4;
00064     uint32_t offset, len;
00065     if (remaining == 0)
00066       cout << "success" << endl;
00067     else {
00068       while (remaining) {
00069         try {
00070           error = decode_i32(&ptr, &remaining);
00071           offset = decode_i32(&ptr, &remaining);
00072           len = decode_i32(&ptr, &remaining);
00073         }
00074         catch (Exception &e) {
00075           HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00076           break;
00077         }
00078         cout << "rejected: offset=" << offset << " span=" << len << " " << Error::get_text(error) << endl;
00079       }
00080     }
00081   }
00082 
00083 }

00085 RangeServerCommandInterpreter::RangeServerCommandInterpreter(Comm *comm, Hyperspace::SessionPtr &hyperspace_ptr, struct sockaddr_in addr, RangeServerClientPtr &range_server_ptr) : m_comm(comm), m_hyperspace_ptr(hyperspace_ptr), m_addr(addr), m_range_server_ptr(range_server_ptr), m_cur_scanner_id(-1) {
00086   HqlHelpText::install_range_server_client_text();
00087   return;
00088 }

00091 void RangeServerCommandInterpreter::execute_line(const String &line) {
00092   TableIdentifier *table = 0;
00093   RangeSpec range;
00094   TableInfo *table_info;
00095   std::string schema_str;
00096   std::string out_str;
00097   SchemaPtr schema_ptr;
00098   hql_interpreter_state state;
00099   hql_interpreter interp(state);
00100   parse_info<> info;
00101   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00102   ScanBlock scanblock;
00103   int32_t scanner_id;
00104   EventPtr event_ptr;
00105 
00106   info = parse(line.c_str(), interp, space_p);
00107 
00108   if (info.full) {
00109 
00110     // if table name specified, get associated objects
00111     if (state.table_name != "") {
00112       table_info = m_table_map[state.table_name];
00113       if (table_info == 0) {
00114         table_info = new TableInfo(state.table_name);
00115         table_info->load(m_hyperspace_ptr);
00116         m_table_map[state.table_name] = table_info;
00117       }
00118       table = table_info->get_table_identifier();
00119       table_info->get_schema_ptr(schema_ptr);
00120     }
00121 
00122     // if end row is "??", transform it to 0xff 0xff
00123     if (state.range_end_row == "??")
00124       state.range_end_row = Key::END_ROW_MARKER;
00125 
00126     if (state.command == COMMAND_LOAD_RANGE) {
00127       RangeState range_state;
00128 
00129       cout << "TableName  = " << state.table_name << endl;
00130       cout << "StartRow   = " << state.range_start_row << endl;
00131       cout << "EndRow     = " << state.range_end_row << endl;
00132 
00133       range.start_row = state.range_start_row.c_str();
00134       range.end_row = state.range_end_row.c_str();
00135 
00136       range_state.soft_limit = 200000000LL;
00137 
00138       m_range_server_ptr->load_range(m_addr, *table, range, 0, range_state, 0);
00139 
00140     }
00141     else if (state.command == COMMAND_UPDATE) {
00142       TestSource *tsource = 0;
00143 
00144       if (!FileUtils::exists(state.input_file.c_str()))
00145         HT_THROW(Error::FILE_NOT_FOUND, std::string("Input file '") + state.input_file + "' does not exist");
00146 
00147       tsource = new TestSource(state.input_file, schema_ptr.get());
00148 
00149       uint8_t *send_buf = 0;
00150       size_t   send_buf_len = 0;
00151       DynamicBuffer buf(BUFFER_SIZE);
00152       ByteString key, value;
00153       size_t key_len, value_len;
00154       bool outstanding = false;
00155 
00156       while (true) {
00157 
00158         while (tsource->next(key, value)) {
00159           key_len = key.length();
00160           value_len = value.length();
00161           buf.ensure(key_len + value_len);
00162           buf.add_unchecked(key.ptr, key_len);
00163           buf.add_unchecked(value.ptr, value_len);
00164           if (buf.fill() > BUFFER_SIZE)
00165             break;
00166         }
00167 
00171         if (buf.fill()) {
00172           std::vector<ByteString> keys;
00173           struct LtByteString ltbs;
00174           const uint8_t *ptr;
00175           size_t len;
00176 
00177           key.ptr = ptr = buf.base;
00178 
00179           while (ptr < buf.ptr) {
00180             keys.push_back(key);
00181             key.next();
00182             key.next();
00183             ptr = key.ptr;
00184           }
00185 
00186           std::sort(keys.begin(), keys.end(), ltbs);
00187 
00188           send_buf = new uint8_t [buf.fill()];
00189           uint8_t *sendp = send_buf;
00190           for (size_t i=0; i<keys.size(); i++) {
00191             key = keys[i];
00192             key.next();
00193             key.next();
00194             len = key.ptr - keys[i].ptr;
00195             memcpy(sendp, keys[i].ptr, len);
00196             sendp += len;
00197           }
00198           send_buf_len = sendp - send_buf;
00199           buf.clear();
00200         }
00201         else
00202           send_buf_len = 0;
00203 
00204         if (outstanding) {
00205           if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00206             HT_THROW(Protocol::response_code(event_ptr), (Protocol::string_format_message(event_ptr)));
00207           process_event(event_ptr);
00208         }
00209 
00210         outstanding = false;
00211 
00212         if (send_buf_len > 0) {
00213           StaticBuffer mybuf(send_buf, send_buf_len);
00214           m_range_server_ptr->update(m_addr, *table, mybuf, &sync_handler);
00215           outstanding = true;
00216         }
00217         else
00218           break;
00219       }
00220 
00221       if (outstanding) {
00222         if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00223           HT_THROW(Protocol::response_code(event_ptr), (Protocol::string_format_message(event_ptr)));
00224         process_event(event_ptr);
00225       }
00226 
00227     }
00228     else if (state.command == COMMAND_CREATE_SCANNER) {
00229       ScanSpec scan_spec;
00230       RowInterval ri;
00231 
00232       range.start_row = state.range_start_row.c_str();
00233       range.end_row = state.range_end_row.c_str();
00234 
00238       scan_spec.row_limit = state.scan.limit;
00239       scan_spec.max_versions = state.scan.max_versions;
00240       for (size_t i=0; i<state.scan.columns.size(); i++)
00241         scan_spec.columns.push_back(state.scan.columns[i].c_str());
00242 
00243       for (size_t i=0; i<state.scan.row_intervals.size(); i++) {
00244         if (state.scan.row_intervals[i].start > state.scan.row_intervals[i].end ||
00245             (state.scan.row_intervals[i].start == state.scan.row_intervals[i].end &&
00246              !(state.scan.row_intervals[i].start_inclusive || state.scan.row_intervals[i].end_inclusive)))
00247           HT_THROW(Error::HQL_PARSE_ERROR, "Bad row range");
00248         ri.start = (state.scan.row_intervals[i].start == "") ? ""
00249           : state.scan.row_intervals[i].start.c_str();
00250         ri.start_inclusive = state.scan.row_intervals[i].start_inclusive;
00251         ri.end = state.scan.row_intervals[i].end.c_str();
00252         ri.end_inclusive = state.scan.row_intervals[i].end_inclusive;
00253         scan_spec.row_intervals.push_back(ri);
00254       }
00255 
00256       scan_spec.time_interval.first  = state.scan.start_time;
00257       scan_spec.time_interval.second = state.scan.end_time;
00258       scan_spec.return_deletes = state.scan.return_deletes;
00259 
00262       m_range_server_ptr->create_scanner(m_addr, *table, range, scan_spec, scanblock);
00263 
00264       m_cur_scanner_id = scanblock.get_scanner_id();
00265 
00266       ByteString key, value;
00267 
00268       while (scanblock.next(key, value))
00269         display_scan_data(key, value, schema_ptr);
00270 
00271       if (scanblock.eos())
00272         m_cur_scanner_id = -1;
00273 
00274     }
00275     else if (state.command == COMMAND_FETCH_SCANBLOCK) {
00276 
00277       if (state.scanner_id == -1) {
00278         if (m_cur_scanner_id == -1)
00279           HT_THROW(Error::RANGESERVER_INVALID_SCANNER_ID, "No currently open scanner");
00280         scanner_id = m_cur_scanner_id;
00281         m_cur_scanner_id = -1;
00282       }
00283       else
00284         scanner_id = state.scanner_id;
00285 
00288       m_range_server_ptr->fetch_scanblock(m_addr, scanner_id, scanblock);
00289 
00290       ByteString key, value;
00291 
00292       while (scanblock.next(key, value))
00293         display_scan_data(key, value, schema_ptr);
00294 
00295       if (scanblock.eos())
00296         m_cur_scanner_id = -1;
00297 
00298     }
00299     else if (state.command == COMMAND_DESTROY_SCANNER) {
00300 
00301       if (state.scanner_id == -1) {
00302         if (m_cur_scanner_id == -1)
00303           return;
00304         scanner_id = m_cur_scanner_id;
00305         m_cur_scanner_id = -1;
00306       }
00307       else
00308         scanner_id = state.scanner_id;
00309 
00310       m_range_server_ptr->destroy_scanner(m_addr, scanner_id);
00311 
00312     }
00313     else if (state.command == COMMAND_DROP_RANGE) {
00314 
00315       range.start_row = state.range_start_row.c_str();
00316       range.end_row = state.range_end_row.c_str();
00317 
00318       m_range_server_ptr->drop_range(m_addr, *table, range, &sync_handler);
00319 
00320       if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00321         HT_THROW(Protocol::response_code(event_ptr), (Protocol::string_format_message(event_ptr)));
00322 
00323     }
00324     else if (state.command == COMMAND_REPLAY_BEGIN) {
00325       m_range_server_ptr->replay_begin(m_addr, false, &sync_handler);  // fix me!!  added metadata boolean
00326       if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00327         HT_THROW(Protocol::response_code(event_ptr), (Protocol::string_format_message(event_ptr)));
00328     }
00329     else if (state.command == COMMAND_REPLAY_LOG) {
00330       cout << "Not implemented." << endl;
00331     }
00332     else if (state.command == COMMAND_REPLAY_COMMIT) {
00333       m_range_server_ptr->replay_commit(m_addr, &sync_handler);
00334       if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00335         HT_THROW(Protocol::response_code(event_ptr), (Protocol::string_format_message(event_ptr)));
00336     }
00337     else if (state.command == COMMAND_HELP) {
00338       const char **text = HqlHelpText::Get(state.str);
00339       if (text) {
00340         for (size_t i=0; text[i]; i++)
00341           cout << text[i] << endl;
00342       }
00343       else
00344         cout << endl << "no help for '" << state.str << "'" << endl << endl;
00345     }
00346     else if (state.command == COMMAND_SHUTDOWN) {
00347       m_range_server_ptr->shutdown(m_addr);
00348     }
00349     else
00350       HT_THROW(Error::HQL_PARSE_ERROR, "unsupported command");
00351   }
00352   else
00353     HT_THROW(Error::HQL_PARSE_ERROR, std::string("parse error at: ") + info.stop);
00354 }

00361 void
00362 RangeServerCommandInterpreter::display_scan_data(const ByteString &bskey,
00363     const ByteString &value, SchemaPtr &schema_ptr) {
00364   Key key(bskey);
00365   Schema::ColumnFamily *cf;
00366 
00367   if (key.flag == FLAG_DELETE_ROW) {
00368     cout << key.timestamp << " " << key.row << " DELETE" << endl;
00369   }
00370   else {
00371     if (key.column_family_code > 0) {
00372       cf = schema_ptr->get_column_family(key.column_family_code);
00373       if (key.flag == FLAG_DELETE_CELL)
00374         cout << key.timestamp << " " << key.row << " " << cf->name << ":" << key.column_qualifier << " DELETE" << endl;
00375       else {
00376         cout << key.timestamp << " " << key.row << " " << cf->name << ":" << key.column_qualifier;
00377         cout << endl;
00378       }
00379     }
00380     else {
00381       cerr << "Bad column family (" << (int)key.column_family_code << ") for row key " << key.row;
00382       cerr << endl;
00383     }
00384   }
00385 }
